original_text: And David was then in an hold, and the garrison of the Philistines was then in Bethlehem.
korean_text: 그 때에 다윗은 산성에 있고 그 때에 블레셋 사람의 요새는 베들레헴에 있는지라

sentences.original_text: And David was then in an hold
and garrison of the Philistines was then in Bethlehem
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 블레셋 사람들의 수비대가 베들레헴에 있었다
